text:
Taylor Swift and her beau Joe Alwyn looked like happy lovebirds on their romantic summer vacation in the Turks And Caicos.

The 28-year-old pop star and the 27-year-old British actor were seen walking hand-in-hand on the beach while carrying cold drinks in images that surfaced on Monday.

The power couple were at the exclusive destination for several days working on their tans.

So close: Taylor Swift and her beau Joe Alwyn held hands in the Turks And Caicos in new photos that surfaced on Monday

We'll drink to that: The 28-year-old pop star and the 27-year-old British actor were on the beach while carrying cold drinks

Compatible: It is not known yet if the two are living together, but they do seem to spend a lot of time in each other's company

Swift had on a cute blue-and-white striped bikini by company Sold & Striped that had ties on the briefs. The design is named The Jane.

The Look What You Made Me Do hitmaker showed off a very toned figure with a tiny waistline and shapely legs as she flashed a pair of designer sunglasses that framed her face perfectly.

Last week the pop princess slipped into a patriotic red, white and blue striped bikini as she and her love enjoyed a day of snorkeling in the sunshine.

Island life: The power couple has been at the beach destination for several days already and they seem to have deep tans as a result

The pair spent Independence Day with one another, dipping in and out of the crystal clear waters.

The stunning singer went make-up free for her swim in the ocean, tying back her blonde hair in a ponytail.

Joe showcased his own toned torso in a pair of navy white striped swim shorts, with both carrying a snorkel and flippers.

Cute look: Swift had on a cute blue-and-white striped bikini by company Sold & Striped that had ties on the briefs. The design is named The Jane. The Look What You Made Me Do hitmaker showed off a very toned figure with a tiny waistline and toned legs as she flashed a pair of designer sunglasses that framed her face perfectly

They frolicked around in the sea for a while, taking turns floating on their backs and swimming side by side as Taylor enjoyed a break from her highly successful Reputation tour.

The duo could be seen cosying up in the water, the Blank Space hitmaker hugging the handsome actor from behind and planting sweet kisses on his shoulder.

Strapping on some snorkels, goggles and flippers, they messed around in the water, making sure not to leave one another's side.

Shy for a reason: Swift has not been as open about her relationship with the actor as in the past there was too much focus on her love life: she has dated John Mayer and Harry Styles, among others

The luxury resort will have cost them a pretty penny to stay there.

But it won't exactly break the bank. Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk star, Joe, is thought to be worth around $250k, while his girlfriend is worth well over 100 times that, at a staggering $280million.

Despite their fame, the duo have kept their relationship fairly private since rumours first emerged they were dating.

Joe, who is best known for his role in the 2016 war drama has been attending some of Taylor's concerts as part of her Reputation tour.

Wanna hit the water? Behind the lovebirds was a catamaran boat that looked ready for takeoff

Back to the hotel? After a while they seemed to want to head up the beach, but they may have just been in need of some shade

Let's hit it: Joe took the lead and walked his lady love up the white sands of the Turks And Caicos beach

In March, the couple were pictured on a hike, yet before then they hadn't been seen since the Jingle Ball in New York in December where they were pictured holding hands.

During the past year and half they've been dating the songstress has reportedly been spending a lot of time in London where Joe lives.

According to The Sun, the singer had been renting a house in North London for their rendezvous and they are rumored to use disguises while going out and about in the city.

'They're clearly serious,' an insider told E!. 'Taylor's met all of Joe's family. They've done many a Sunday roast together — in fact it happens without fail if she's here over a weekend—and they seem very comfortable around her,

Cheers my love: Not wanting to kill the buzz, the famous pair took their drinks into the ocean

Millions of reasons to celebrate: Her new tour has been making a fortune. She is reportedly worth almost $300m

'His brothers all seem to be fans of them together as they've hung out with Taylor and Joe on several occasions.'

Taylor previously dated British actor Tom Hiddleston for three months, with the couple not shying away from showing off their romance with lots of public outings — including her famous celeb packed July 4 shindig at her Rhode Island mansion.

Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively, Gigi Hadid, Karlie Kloss, Ruby Rose and Uzo Aduba were all on hand to witness Hiddleswift in full PDA mode two years ago.

Tom's reputation as a uber-cool and suave actor went a little by the wayside when he wore a white tank-top with 'I [heart] TS' emblazoned on the front.

That short-lived relationship followed Taylor's split from Scottish DJ Calvin Harris in June 2016 after 15 months together.
title: Taylor Swift and Joe Alwyn enjoy drinks on the beach
